entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
